p: ZIKV infection is a self-limiting illness that is mostly asymptomatic. Lazear et al. [ 29] noted that approximately 20% of the individuals infected with ZIKV progress to a clinically apparent febrile illness, although rarely hospitalized. Rajah et al. [ 30] also observed that 20% of the people infected with ZIKV present mild symptoms. In our simulations, we assume that 80% of ZIKV-infectious people continue exposing to mosquitoes ( Ï€ = 0.80).
